name: 2nd International Conference on Social Sciences in the Modern Era
content: Change is the only constant in the field of social sciences. Like a living organism, it evolves, adapts, and discovers new opportunities. For those working in the field, it is essential to actively stay up to date on the new developments in the field. The 2nd International Conference on Social Sciences in the Modern Era offers that exact opportunity. All papers will have publication opportunities in the Conference Proceeding (with ISBN and a unique DOI number assigned to each paper) or in indexed international journals indexed with SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, GOOGLE SCHOLAR, COPERNICUS. The SSMECONF will be an in-person event and will also include live-stream Virtual sessions for those who cannot join physically but wish to learn and connect. In-person participants and speakers will get a Letter of Invitation after registration.
